chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
x0: (R * T)%type
y: SF_seq
x: SF_seq

Goal:
SF_cons x0 (SF_cat x y) = SF_cat (SF_cons x0 x) y

Premises:
SF_cons = fun (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := fst h; SF_t := (SF_h s, snd h) :: SF_t s |} : R * T -> SF_seq -> SF_seq
*** [ R : Set ]
SF_cat = fun x y : SF_seq => {| SF_h := SF_h x; SF_t := SF_t x ++ SF_t y |} : SF_seq -> SF_seq -> SF_seq
SF_last_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x y)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x y)) = last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y)
SF_lx_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_cat x y) = SF_lx x ++ behead (SF_lx y)
size_unzip1 : forall s : seq (?T * ?T0), size (unzip1 s) = size s where ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
size_unzip2 : forall s : seq (?T * ?T0), size (unzip2 s) = size s where ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
unzip2_behead : forall s : seq (?S * ?T), unzip2 (behead s) = behead (unzip2 s) where ?S : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
unzip1_behead : forall s : seq (?S * ?T), unzip1 (behead s) = behead (unzip1 s) where ?S : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
unzip2_belast : forall s : seq (?S * ?T), unzip2 (belast s) = belast (unzip2 s) where ?S : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
unzip1_belast : forall s : seq (?S * ?T), unzip1 (belast s) = belast (unzip1 s) where ?S : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
unzip2_snd : forall s : seq (?S * ?T), unzip2 s = [seq snd i | i <- s] where ?S : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
unzip1_fst : forall s : seq (?S * ?T), unzip1 s = [seq fst i | i <- s] where ?S : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
unzip1_rcons : forall (s : seq (?S * ?T)) (h : ?S * ?T), unzip1 (rcons s h) = rcons (unzip1 s) (fst h) where ?S : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
unzip2_rcons : forall (s : seq (?S * ?T)) (h : ?S * ?T), unzip2 (rcons s h) = rcons (unzip2 s) (snd h) where ?S : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
last_unzip1 : forall (x1 : ?S) (y0 : ?T) (s : seq (?S * ?T)), last x1 (unzip1 s) = fst (last (x1, y0) s) where ?S : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_cons_dec : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq), P (SF_cons h s)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s
SF_cons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq), P s -> P (SF_cons h s)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s
SF_cons_rcons : forall (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq) (l : R * T), SF_cons h (SF_rcons s l) = SF_rcons (SF_cons h s) l
Record almost_ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_art { ARadd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; ARadd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); ARadd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); ARmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; ARmul_0_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO; ARmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); ARmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z); ARdistr_l : forall x y z : R, req (...
rcons_dec : forall P : seq ?T -> Type, P [::] -> (forall (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), P (rcons s t)) -> forall s : seq ?T, P s where ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
rcons_ind : forall P : seq ?T -> Type, P [::] -> (forall (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), P s -> P (rcons s t)) -> forall s : seq ?T, P s where ?T : [T : Type x0 : R * T x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
Field_theory.rmul_ext : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> forall x y : R, req x y -> forall x0 y0 : R, req x0 y0 -> req (rmul x x0) (rmul y y0)
SF_nil = fun x0 : R => {| SF_h := x0; SF_t := [::] |} : R -> SF_seq Argument scope is [R_scope]
SF_rcons_dec : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (s : SF_seq) (t : R * T), P (SF_rcons s t)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s
ARmul_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)
ARopp_mul_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (ropp (rmul x y)) (rmul (ropp x) y)
SF_rcons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (s : SF_seq) (t : R * T), P s -> P (SF_rcons s t)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s
SF_rev_rcons : forall (s : SF_seq) (t : R * T), SF_rev (SF_rcons s t) = SF_cons t (SF_rev s)
SF_lx_nil : forall x0 : R, SF_lx (SF_nil x0) = [:: x0]
Record ring_morph (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R) : Prop := mkmorph { morph0 : req (phi cO) rO; morph1 : req (phi cI) rI; morph_add : forall x y : C, req (phi (cadd x y)) (radd (phi x) (phi y)); morph_sub : forall x y : C, req (phi (csub x y)) (rsub (phi x) (phi y)); morph_mul : forall x y : C, req (phi (cmul x y)) (rmul (phi x) (phi y)); morph_opp : forall x : C, req (phi (copp x)) (ropp (phi x)); morph_eq :...
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
morph_eq : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi -> forall x y : C, ceqb x y = true -> req (phi x) (phi y)
ARsub_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rsub x y) (radd x (ropp y))
nth = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) => fix nth (s : seq T) (n : nat) {struct n} : T := match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: s' => match n with | 0%nat => x | S n' => nth s' n' end end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> nat -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope nat_scope]
SF_size_cons : forall (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq), SF_size (SF_cons h s) = S (SF_size s)
SF_rev_cons : forall (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq), SF_rev (SF_cons h s) = SF_rcons (SF_rev s) h
ARmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
SF_lx_cons : forall (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_cons h s) = fst h :: SF_lx s
SF_ly_cons : forall (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq), SF_ly (SF_cons h s) = snd h :: SF_ly s
SF_t = fun s : SF_seq => let (_, SF_t) := s in SF_t : SF_seq -> seq (R * T)
rev_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), rev (rcons s x) = x :: rev s
ARmul_1_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x

```coq
unfold SF_cons, SF_cat. simpl. f_equal. rewrite SF_t_cat. reflexivity.
Qed.```
